function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to close proximity of pedestrians","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreak","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures, reduce crowd density, and use protective barriers","Technologies":"Computer vision for crowd density estimation, automated pedestrian counting systems","People":"Pedestrians, general public, and public health","Owner":"Local authorities, city planners, and public health organizations"}]}
